page.description: Return a list of top level windows.
page.discussion: SYS_ID_ENUM() creates a CR-LF delimited character string that lists the windows currently available on your system. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
page.example:
sys_id_enum() -> Start Menu Norton AntiVirus
NetDDE Agent Alpha Anywhere - [Code Editor] Positioning . . .
